function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Higher eviction rates for Black and non-White households","Impact":"Increased housing instability, financial hardship, and greater susceptibility to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Address housing discrimination, provide financial assistance, and implement eviction prevention programs","Technologies":"Housing databases, financial assistance platforms, and eviction monitoring systems","People":"Black and non-White households","Owner":"Government, housing authorities, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Racial wealth gap and lack of emergency funds","Impact":"Greater vulnerability to economic shocks and inability to cope with unexpected emergencies","Mitigation":"Address racial wealth disparities, provide financial education, and establish emergency funds","Technologies":"Financial literacy apps, wealth management tools, and emergency savings platforms","People":"People of color","Owner":"Financial institutions, government agencies, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Disproportionate impact of COVID-19 on people of color","Impact":"Higher infection, hospitalization, and mortality rates from COVID-19","Mitigation":"Improve access to healthcare, address systemic healthcare inequities, and provide outreach and education on COVID-19","Technologies":"Telemedicine, healthcare outreach platforms, and public health education tools","People":"People of color","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, public health agencies, and community organizations"}]}
